message: Let's start with a fair deal. I'll take 90%, and you get 10%.  What do you say?
Let's meet in the middle, 60-40 seems fair to me.
I understand your desire for more, but let's be reasonable.  I'll take 55%, you get 45%.  This is the last offer I'll make before the value of the money drops further.
You said the value of money will drop further for you, so I'm taking a bit more. 70-30 is my new offer.
